title: Accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps deployed
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, a 200 OK HTTP response code is returned with no content instead of an expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance without any deployed webapps and try to access a URL, I receive a response with HTTP code 200 OK but with no content.
EB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance without any deployed webapps and try to access a URL, I expect to receive an HTTP error 404 instead of a 200 OK response code with no content.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow the steps below:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 instance from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps
3. Access a URL within the Tomcat instance
4. Observe the returned HTTP response code and content
